001package ca.gc.cra.radar.capture.pcap;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.libpcap.JnrPcapAdapter;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.libpcap.Pcap;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.libpcap.PcapHandle;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.nio.file.Files;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.Objects;
012import java.util.Optional;
013import java.util.function.Supplier;
014import org.slf4j.Logger;
015import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
016
017/**
018 * PacketSource implementation that replays packets from an on-disk pcap or pcapng trace.
019 * <p>Provides the same RawFrame payloads produced by live capture so downstream pipelines can
020 * remain unchanged.</p>
021 */
022public final class PcapFilePacketSource implements PacketSource {
023  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PcapFilePacketSource.class);
024  private static final int DLT_EN10MB = 1;
025  private static final int DLT_LINUX_SLL = 113;
026  private static final int DLT_LINUX_SLL2 = 276;
027
028  private final Path pcapPath;
029  private final String filter;
030  private final int snaplen;
031  private final Supplier<Pcap> pcapSupplier;
032
033  private Pcap pcap;
034  private PcapHandle handle;
035  private Path canonicalPath;
036  private long delivered;
037  private volatile boolean exhausted;
038  private boolean truncationWarned;
039
040  /**
041   * Creates an offline packet source using the default JNR libpcap adapter.
042   *
043   * @param pcapPath path to an existing pcap or pcapng file
044   * @param bpf optional BPF expression; blank disables filtering
045   * @param snaplen snap length in bytes
046   */
047  public PcapFilePacketSource(Path pcapPath, String bpf, int snaplen) {
048    this(pcapPath, bpf, snaplen, JnrPcapAdapter::new);
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Creates an offline packet source with an explicit Pcap supplier (primarily for tests).
053   */
054  public PcapFilePacketSource(Path pcapPath, String bpf, int snaplen, Supplier<Pcap> pcapSupplier) {
055    this.pcapPath = Objects.requireNonNull(pcapPath, "pcapPath").toAbsolutePath().normalize();
056    this.filter = (bpf == null || bpf.isBlank()) ? null : bpf.trim();
057    this.snaplen = snaplen;
058    this.pcapSupplier = Objects.requireNonNull(pcapSupplier, "pcapSupplier");
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public void start() throws Exception {
063    if (handle != null) {
064      return;
065    }
066    if (!Files.exists(pcapPath) || !Files.isRegularFile(pcapPath)) {
067      throw new IllegalArgumentException("pcapFile must reference an existing file: " + pcapPath);
068    }
069    if (!Files.isReadable(pcapPath)) {
070      throw new IOException("pcapFile is not readable: " + pcapPath);
071    }
072
073    this.canonicalPath = pcapPath.toRealPath();
074    this.pcap = Objects.requireNonNull(pcapSupplier.get(), "pcap supplier returned null");
075    this.handle = pcap.openOffline(canonicalPath, snaplen);
076    this.exhausted = false;
077    this.delivered = 0L;
078    this.truncationWarned = false;
079
080    int datalink = handle.dataLink();
081    if (!isSupportedLinkType(datalink)) {
082      Path path = effectivePath();
083      try {
084        close();
085      } catch (Exception ex) {
086        log.warn("Failed to close pcap handle after datalink rejection", ex);
087      }
088      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
089          "Unsupported data link type " + datalink + " (" + dataLinkName(datalink) + ") for " + path);
090    }
091
092    if (filter != null) {
093      handle.setFilter(filter);
094      log.info("Applied BPF filter '{}' to offline capture", filter);
095    } else {
096      log.info("No BPF filter applied to offline capture ({}); replaying all packets", effectivePath());
097    }
098    log.info(
099        "Offline capture opened for {} (snaplen={}, datalink={} {})",
100        effectivePath(),
101        snaplen,
102        datalink,
103        dataLinkName(datalink));
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  public Optional<RawFrame> poll() throws Exception {
108    if (handle == null) {
109      return Optional.empty();
110    }
111
112    final RawFrame[] frameHolder = new RawFrame[1];
113    boolean more =
114        handle.next(
115            (tsMicros, data, caplen) -> {
116              int length = Math.max(0, caplen);
117              byte[] copy = new byte[length];
118              if (length > 0) {
119                System.arraycopy(data, 0, copy, 0, length);
120              }
121              if (!truncationWarned && snaplen > 0 && length >= snaplen) {
122                log.warn(
123                    "Encountered packet reaching snaplen {} while replaying {}; payload may be truncated",
124                    snaplen,
125                    effectivePath());
126                truncationWarned = true;
127              }
128              frameHolder[0] = new RawFrame(copy, tsMicros);
129              delivered++;
130            });
131
132    if (!more) {
133      exhausted = true;
134      close();
135      return Optional.empty();
136    }
137    return Optional.ofNullable(frameHolder[0]);
138  }
139
140  @Override
141  public boolean isExhausted() {
142    return exhausted;
143  }
144
145  @Override
146  public void close() throws Exception {
147    if (handle != null) {
148      try {
149        handle.close();
150      } finally {
151        handle = null;
152      }
153    }
154    if (pcap != null) {
155      try {
156        pcap.close();
157      } finally {
158        pcap = null;
159      }
160    }
161    Path path = effectivePath();
162    if (delivered > 0) {
163      log.info("Offline capture closed for {} after {} packets", path, delivered);
164    } else {
165      log.info("Offline capture closed for {}", path);
166    }
167  }
168
169  private Path effectivePath() {
170    return canonicalPath != null ? canonicalPath : pcapPath;
171  }
172
173  private static boolean isSupportedLinkType(int datalink) {
174    return datalink == DLT_EN10MB || datalink == DLT_LINUX_SLL || datalink == DLT_LINUX_SLL2;
175  }
176
177  private static String dataLinkName(int datalink) {
178    return switch (datalink) {
179      case DLT_EN10MB -> "EN10MB";
180      case DLT_LINUX_SLL -> "LINUX_SLL";
181      case DLT_LINUX_SLL2 -> "LINUX_SLL2";
182      default -> "DLT_" + datalink;
183    };
184  }
185}
